text:
<@U25PYL3Q8> Thank you so much! :cat-roomba-exceptionally-fast: If I add css ("display: block;") to the hbspt.forms.create it does not create iframe! This is such a strange hack, I wouldn't find it by myself.

We already had the form set to be inserted as HTML in the form settings. And sadly our client does not want to remove the form from the main page.... So your solution is really lifesaver for us. :heart_hands:
:slightly_smiling_face: Glad this helped, Iâ€™ve had to work around a bunch of issues with forms since day 1, so glad this helped out a bit!
